name: Pay to Win (Léon)
description:
Made in an hour for The hight effort Jam

F.A.Q.

What is it?
It's a simple pay-to-win game. You pay = you win. That's all (really)

What should I expect if I buy the key?
To get an idea, enter a random word in place of the key and you'll see a message appear: "You lose". Just imagine that it says "You win" instead and you'll have a pretty good idea of what to expect.
Basically, you buy a text file (key.txt) that contains the key to enter to win.
